reviewText: VHS nostalgic value is quickly overcome by its non Kodachrome fuzziness.

Playboy - Girls of the Hard Rock is fifty-three minutes and was released on DVD on March 13, 2001. Girls of the Hard Rock consists of three Playmates, four Playboy Cyber Girls, and eight lovely extras. Below is the list of people and the segments they were in.

Kristi Cline-Playboy Playmate of the Month for September 1999
Tishara Lee Cousino-Playboy Playmate of the Month for May 1999
Deanna Brooks-Playboy Playmate of the Month for May 1998
Jessica Turner-Playboy Cyber Girls of the Week (Week one of November 2000)
Roxanne Galla-Playboy Cyber Girls of the Week (Week four of July 2001)
Amy Miller-Playboy Cyber Girls of the Week (Week two of November 2000 & Cybergirl of the Month in March 2001)
Chera Leigh Pollins-Playboy Cyber Girls of the Week (Week four of November 2000 & Cybergirl of the Month in July 2002)
Antoinette Abbott
Ginger Behr
Sarah Carter
Bethany Lynn Garrett
April Renee Harbstreit
Dawn McFall
Stacie Morrissette
Jolan Tebbs

Kristi, Tishara, and Deanna\The Joint-All three females are pretending to play the drums, bass and guitar and stripping to the nude.
Stacie & Jessica\Lady Luck-Start of with the ladies winning at the blackjack table and then the fun begins. Jessica and then Stacie become fully nude.
Chera Leigh Pollins\Bridal Suite-Chera goes from the wedding dress to being topless and finally nude.
Roxanne & Amy\Wet & Wild-The two ladies are wearing a bikini and rubbing oil on each other and then become fully nude.
Bethany, April, & Antoinette\Room Service-Bethany is blind folded and is undressed by April & Antoinette and all three become nude. In the next scene Bethany, April, & Antoinette are wearing evening dress but all three become nude again.
Jolan\50's Serenade-The scene starts of in black and white and then switches over to color. Jolan is fully nude in color only and she sings as well in this segment too.
Sarah, Ginger, & Dawn\Private Cabana-All three become nude for two guys

Irina Voronina-Playboy Playmate of the Month for January 2001 has Playmate Profile clip on her. In Irina brief ten minutes she is mostly nude in her photo shoots and about 75% the time she is nude. To me Irina was worth the wait. There is one goof in this DVD; in the Bonus feature Special Preview says Red Hot Redheads. It is actually a preview of Playboy's Blondes Brunettes Redheads. Playboy - Girls of the Hard Rock gets an AAAAA+++++.

DVD FEATURES

Play Feature
1. Chapter List
2. Introduction
3. The Joint
4. Lady Luck
5. The Bridal Suite
6. Web-Cam Encounter
7. Room Service
8. 50s Serenade
9. Private Cabana
10. End Credits
Bonus Feature
A) Special Preview: Red Hot Redheads
B) Playmate Profile: Miss January 2001, Irina Voronina
Slide Show

Playboy - Girls of the Hard Rock is one hour and ten minutes and was released on video on February 27, 2001. This video consists of two parts. The first part is 55 minutes and consists of three Playmates, four Playboy Cyber Girls, and eight lovely extras. Below is the list of people and the segments they were in.

Kristi Cline-Playboy Playmate of the Month for September 1999
Tishara Lee Cousino-Playboy Playmate of the Month for May 1999
Deanna Brooks-Playboy Playmate of the Month for May 1998
Jessica Turner-Playboy Cyber Girls of the Week (Week one of November 2000)
Roxanne Galla-Playboy Cyber Girls of the Week (Week four of July 2001)
Amy Miller-Playboy Cyber Girls of the Week (Week two of November 2000 & Cybergirl of the Month in March 2001)
Chera Leigh Pollins-Playboy Cyber Girls of the Week (Week four of November 2000 & Cybergirl of the Month in July 2002)
Antoinette Abbott
Ginger Behr
Sarah Carter
Bethany Lynn Garrett
April Renee Harbstreit
Dawn McFall
Stacie Morrissette
Jolan Tebbs

Kristi, Tishara, and Deanna\The Joint-All three females are pretending to play the drums, bass and guitar and stripping to the nude.
Stacie & Jessica\Lady Luck-Start of with the ladies winning at the blackjack table and then the fun begins. Jessica and then Stacie become fully nude.
Chera Leigh Pollins\Bridal Suite-Chera goes from the wedding dress to being topless and finally nude.
Roxanne & Amy\Wet & Wild-The two ladies are wearing a bikini and rubbing oil on each other and then become fully nude.
Bethany, April, & Antoinette\Room Service-Bethany is blind folded and is undressed by April & Antoinette and all three become nude. In the next scene Bethany, April, & Antoinette are wearing evening dress but all three become nude again.
Jolan\50's Serenade-The scene starts of in black and white and then switches over to color. Jolan is fully nude in color only and she sings as well in this segment too.
Sarah, Ginger, & Dawn\Private Cabana-All three become nude for two guys

The second part is ten minutes and features a short on Irina Voronina-Playboy Playmate of the Month for January 2001. In her brief ten minutes she is mostly nude in her photo shoots and about 75% the time she is nude. To me Irina was worth the wait. Playboy - Girls of the Hard Rock gets an AAAAA+++++.

Most of you will enjoy this, with the possible exception of you Playmate fanatics.  I don't know of any who appear, though I'm not an expert.  However, Amy Miller and her girlfriend steal the show and make your purchase well worth it.  Her friend's name is Roxanne, I believe.  They were on the 2001 Girlfriend's NSS cover together.  In this video they get extremely friendly poolside with oil.  Totally hot by Playboy girl-girl standards, though I've made few recent purchases.  Maybe that's the trend now;  let's hope so.
Hard Rock.  After seeing this i want the 80's metal back in action, these girls made me wanna become a rock-star!!! Hef has done it again. All i can say is Damn thats hott!!
